skills.title: Frontend Development
skills.description: Proficient in modern frontend technologies including React.js, HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript. Experienced with UI libraries like Material-UI and Tailwind CSS.

skills.title: Backend Development
skills.description: Strong backend development skills using Node.js, Express.js, and experience with databases including MongoDB, MySQL, and PostgreSQL.

skills.title: Full Stack Development
skills.description: Experienced MERN Stack developer capable of building complete web applications from frontend to backend with modern technologies and best practices.

skills.title: Tools & Technologies
skills.description: Proficient with development tools including Git, GitHub, Postman, and cloud platforms like AWS S3. Experience with REST APIs and JWT authentication.

portfolio.title: Learnify - Social Media With LMS Features (Under development)

It allows users to connect, share posts, follow each other, and interact just like a social network â€” while also providing tools for creating, managing, and taking online courses.

portfolio.title: Book Store CRUD
portfolio.description: A web-based book store application with complete CRUD operations. Built using React.js, Node.js, and styled with Tailwind CSS for a modern user experience.

portfolio.title: Weather Application
portfolio.description: Dynamic weather forecasting web app providing real-time updates using OpenWeather API. Displays temperature, humidity, wind speed in an appealing UI using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

portfolio.title: To-Do CRUD Application
portfolio.description: Efficient task management application with CRUD functionality built using React.js, Node.js, and Tailwind CSS for a seamless user experience.

portfolio.title: BMI Calculator
portfolio.description: Interactive BMI Calculator built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Helps users determine their BMI category based on weight and height inputs.
